answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
The Fairfax County, Va. Office of Public Private Partnerships has a strong model for working with corporations, local businesses, and community organizations. They use a set of criteria for approving partnership requests, and work to coordinate the many relationships across the organization through a central office. Visit http://www.fairfaxcountypartnerships.org for more info.
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Eric Norenberg
text: How are other cities coordinating fundraising and sponsorship efforts by different departments or city-related organizations to supplement reduced budgets?  Does anyone have a committee or person that must review support or sponsorship requests to be sure they are appropriate and do duplicate similar requests to the same company?  Or possibly a checklist or form that must be completed and approved before solicitation can occur?
title: Fundraising / Sponsorship Coordination
